section1.title: Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information when you register on our site, log in to your account, create playlists, or share content. The information collected includes your name, email address, and potentially your music preferences and application usage history.

We also collect information about your music preferences and your usage history of our application to enhance your experience.

section2.content: The information we collect is used to personalize your experience, improve our website, improve customer service, and process transactions. We may also use this information to send periodic emails regarding updates to our service or other products and services.

section3.content: We implement various security measures to protect the security of your personal information. We use advanced encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online, and we also protect your information offline.

section4.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance the user experience. A cookie is a small file placed on your computer's hard drive. You can refuse the use of cookies by changing your browser settings, but this may affect certain features of our service.

This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

what_is.question: What is mixlink?
what_is.answer: mixlink is a platform that allows you to create collaborative playlists across different music streaming platforms. You can share and contribute to playlists without needing to switch applications or create new accounts.

how_works.question: How does mixlink work?
how_works.answer: mixlink creates a bridge between different streaming platforms. You create a playlist, share the link with your friends, and everyone can add songs from their preferred platform. Our system handles the references to songs across different platforms.

platforms.question: Which streaming platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: Currently, mixlink supports Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music, and Deezer. We are continuously working on adding new platforms to provide an even more comprehensive experience.

create.question: How do I create an account?
create.answer: mixlink uses OAuth authentication, which means you don't need to create a separate account. You can simply sign in with your existing Spotify, Google, or Apple Music account. Click on 'Login' in the menu and choose your preferred platform to get started.

delete.question: How can I delete my account?
delete.answer: To delete your mixlink account, log in, go to your profile, then to account settings. You will find the option 'Delete my account' there. Once confirmed, all your data will be removed from our servers. Note that this will not modify your accounts on the connected streaming platforms.

oauth.question: Can I connect multiple streaming accounts to my mixlink account?
oauth.answer: Yes, you can connect multiple streaming service accounts to your mixlink profile. This will allow you to easily add content from any of these services and export your playlists to them. You can manage your connections in the 'Connected Services' section of your profile.

free.question: What can I do with a free account?
free.answer: With a free account, you can create up to 5 playlists and add up to 50 songs per playlist. You can also participate in collaborative playlists created by other users.

premium.question: What does the Premium subscription offer?
premium.answer: The Premium subscription unlocks additional features like unlimited playlists, unlimited songs per playlist, and a complete history of all your playlists.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: To cancel your subscription, go to the 'Subscription' section of your profile and click on 'Unsubscribe'. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current period, then will not be renewed.

browser.question: Which browsers are supported?
browser.answer: mixlink is compatible with recent versions of major web browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For the best experience, we recommend keeping your browser up to date.

mobile.question: Is mixlink available on mobile?
mobile.answer: Yes, mixlink is fully responsive and works on mobile devices via the web browser. We are also working on developing native mobile apps for iOS and Android.

api.question: Do you offer an API for developers?
api.answer: Yes, we offer an API for developers as part of our Enterprise offering. If you are interested, please contact us to discuss your specific needs and integration options.
